summary: This mod adds several new eyes to the game for human races, both male and female.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59190-1-1413728067.png[/img]


[font=Verdana]About[/font][/size][/b]

[font=Georgia][size=2]This mod adds several new eyes to the game for human races, both male and female. A few of these exist out there, though I've never really personally cared for how any of them were done, or didn't think that they were done... "right". Anyways, here are my renditions of the various forms of Rinnegan.

The Rinnegan are styled after the anime Rinnegan, where the inner circle of the eye is slightly darker than the rest of the eye.

[i]This mod does [b]NOT[/b] give any powers associated with the Rinnegan or Sharingan, it simply adds a few new eye textures.[/i]

[/size][/font][list][*][font=Georgia][size=2]Double Rinnegan (Sage of Six Paths/Madara/Nagato style)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Left Rinnegan with Right Sharingan (Obito style)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Double Rinnegan (double Sasuke style Rinnegan)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Left Rinnegan with Right Sharingan (Sasuke style)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Double Rinnegan (Kaguya/Juubi style)[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Left Rinnegan with Right Sharingan (Kaguya/Juubi style Rinnegan)[/size][/font][/*]
[/list]

[font=Verdana][size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size][/font]

[list=1][*][font=Georgia][size=2]Download latest version.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Unzip downloaded archive.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Copy the [b]Data/[/b] folder in the unzipped archive into your Skyrim [b]Data/[/b] folder.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Profit???[/size][/font][/*]
[/list]

[font=Verdana][size=3][b]Un-Installation[/b][/size][/font]

[list=1][*][font=Georgia][size=2]Delete the [b]Tynarus_Sharingan_&_Rinnegan.esp[/b] file from your Skyrim [b]Data/[/b] folder.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Delete the [b]rinnegan/[/b] rolder from your Skyrim [b]Data/textures/Actors/character/[/b] folder.[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]No more profit... :([/size][/font][/*]
[/list]
author: Tynarus
